title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IX, pt. 217 - Processing Of Health Insurance Claims
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IX, pt. 217 - Processing Of Health Insurance Claims

State Regulations

Subpart 217-1 - Prompt Payment Of Health Insurance Claims (§ 217-1.1 to 217-1.2)

Subpart 217-2 - Coordination Of Benefit Claims (§ 217-2.1 to 217-2.3)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IX, pt. 217

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 1109, 2403, 3224, 3224-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
